categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Axet was a group of 4 Delta-class DX-9 stormtrooper transports used by the Rebel Alliance. The transports were present at a Rebel Depot which was attacked by an Imperial corvette Control that launched 3 TIE Bombers. The transports were trying to power up their engines to attack the corvette when the TIE Bombers managed to destroy all 4 transports before they could do any damage to the Control.
The attack on the depot was recorded and reused to train future pilots. One of the pilots that replayed the mission was Maarek Stele.
